description:
Our business is focused on people and relationships.

We’re on a mission to be Australia’s leading Wealth Management firm, through continuous innovation and by providing outstanding personal service.


We’re an established business, but we’re fresh in our thinking.

We offer our Adviser’s a leading Wealth Management platform and a range of best-in-breed technology solutions to help them grow their business. Our clients benefit from cutting-edge digital tools and our expert investment advice. We’re on the road to being a paper-free office and offer mobile work stations to enable flexible work arrangements.

We employ around 230 staff across our 10 Australian offices, and are extremely proud that 52% of them have worked here for over 10 years. We also encourage all our staff to become shareholders in our company, with staff-ownership currently sitting at 75%.


A supportive team environment

Patersons is a great place for ambitious, intelligent people to do their best work. Our team is a broad mix of those who are starting their careers and seasoned professionals willing to share their wisdom with the next generation. We’re committed to ongoing staff development to help you succeed in your chosen career path and offer a range of training and support services.

“Thank you for considering Patersons as a prospective employer. It’s an exciting time for our business and we’re always keen to hear from talented and ambitious people interested in joining the Patersons team. There are many career pathways available in our Wealth Management, Capital Markets and Operations divisions and we’re committed to providing a friendly, supportive and inclusive working environment for all staff. I encourage you to learn more about what Patersons has to offer and follow us on LinkedIn to keep in touch. “

Michael Manford, Executive Chairman
